LanguageData.PN_BILL_WINDOW_TAB_APPEARANCE_TOOLTIP: Appearance is choiced randomly in four options when it assembled.
LanguageData.PN_BILL_WINDOW_TAB_MATERIAL_BASE_MATERIA: Material to make up the body It affects the durability of the product. The harder it is to process, the longer it takes to make.
LanguageData.PN_BILL_WINDOW_TAB_MATERIAL_COMPONENT_TO: The better component you use, the better performance you can get, but the more difficult it is to make.
LanguageData.PN_BILL_WINDOW_TAB_MATERIAL_AICORE_TOOLT: Persona Core can significantly boost performance.
